summary: This function computes the hash-code of a value.
formals: is the value to compute a hash-code for. (may be null)
returns: Return the hash-code of the value.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val planets = [%22Mercury%22, %22Venus%22, %22Earth%22, %22Mars%22];%0A%0A    val hash1 = F::hash(null);%0A    val hash2 = F::hash(planets);%0A    val hash3 = planets.hashCode();%0A%0A    F::println(hash1);%0A    F::println(hash2);%0A    F::println(hash3);%0A%0A    assert hash2 == hash3;%0A}
